description:
Looking to boost the waterproofness of your Fjallraven G-1000 garments? Enter Greenland Wax. This stuff’s been made since the late 60s in Örnsköldsvik, Fjallraven’s hometown, from a top-secret blend of paraffin and beeswax. Rub it on, melt it in, and get ready to enjoy your favourite G-1000 jackets and pants, rain or shine.

  • Made from paraffin and beeswax
  • Adds water repellency to Fjallraven's G-1000 garments, allowing the cotton/poly fabric to withstand light rain
  • Large size is 90g and will wax about 10 garments
  • Small size is 20g and will wax 2 to 3 garments
name: Fjallraven Greenland Wax
